fields.name: product-owner
fields.validation: it should be a valid email

fields.name: data-freshness
fields.validation: it should be a valid data_freshness SLA in number of days data is being updated

fields.name: data-quality_score
fields.validation: it should be a valid number that define data quality from 0-1

fields.name: pii-data
fields.validation: There should not be pii data in this table

fields.name: last-updated
fields.validation: The pii data shoudl be verify daily which means the date from today to last_updated could not be more than one day

fields.name: link-to-privacy-policy
fields.validation: It should be a link to either a pdf file or a confluence wiki page
